channel.title: Question about Compiling while running server
channel.description: I was wondering if you can compile while your server is still up and running so that you don't have to take it down and then on the server status page your uptime goes down. Is there another way cause i don't want to go down from 100%. I couldn't find anything about this in forums. Thanks in advance :D

item.title: Question about Compiling while running server
item.dc:creator: @dclawsftw dclawsftw
item.description:
@dclawsftw wrote:

alright i’m going to trust you with this one! I’m scared

Read full topic
item.source: Question about Compiling while running server

item.title: Question about Compiling while running server
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

Unfortunately there is no way of doing so. However, if you only close it down for a moment, your server’s online time should still remain at 100%.

Read full topic
item.source: Question about Compiling while running server
